name: Xtreme Stunt Ball
description:
A simple 3D platformer that uses modified physics to make the game enjoyable and somewhat hard/annoying. I have categorised the game as strategy but I would say it is borderline strategy.

This game is free, though any donation would be apreciated very much :)

To do list -

  • Create all levels
  • Make menu visually appealing
  • Make the game visually appealing
  • Make the level selector visually appealing
  • Fix the level selector (I broke it)
